title: How to Get the Mystery Gift in Pok√©mon Platinum

steps.title: Go to the third floor and talk to a man.
steps.content: Go to the third floor and talk to a man. He will ask you for an interview; Say yes.

steps.title: For the feedback type Wi-Fi Connection.
steps.content: For the feedback type Wi-Fi Connection.

steps.title: Turn it back on and you will have a mystery game two blocks under the load game button.
steps.content: Turn it back on and you will have a mystery game two blocks under the load game button.

steps.title: You now have a mystery gift.
steps.content: You now have a mystery gift.
